mapper.select: select id id,user_id userId,section_id sectionId,command_degree commandDegree, create_time createTime,update_time updateTime from zj_command_degree where user_id=#{userId} and section_id=#{sectionId}

select a.user_id userId,b.section_name sectionName,a.command_degree commandDegree from zj_command_degree a left join zj_section_info b on a.section_id=b.section_id where user_id=#{userId} order by a.command_degree asc
